reviewText: Good comedy.  A different view of what appears to be Doc Martin's town.
Not terribly funny. Bit of a waste of Dawn French.
series one is great, series two no as great but i love dawn french.
I would recommend this series to anyone who loves a good comedy. Dawn French and Catherine Tate were brilliant as usual and I very much wish that the series went longer.
Very good series...too bad there were only 2 series. I bought it because Dawn French is in it but I love all the characters.

i love Dawn French and i really enjoyed WILD WEST, when it was aired on BBC AMERICA. i would buy the dvd if it was region 1. i hope it is soon. the same gripe applies to HEX season 2. why does it take so long to reach usa format?
